name: bbbot
description: The BrewBoo v3 contract (https://ftmscan.com/address/0x68f598280a843A5Ce07C1b9fB0D3aF00Cd085c31) collects protocol fees from SpookySwap. It permissionlessly allows any party to call the contract  convert the collected protocol fees to BOO, which is then sent to xBOO. Callers will receive a 0.1% bounty for calling the contract.
author: mentasuave01
